data.text:
@Chintzmehta You may experience a longer hold time as we are experiencing higher than usual call volumes.
Thank you for your understanding.

Kind Regards
Air France India 
2/2

@Chintzmehta Hi,
You will be rebooked as per your itinerary. For assistance with re-booking, call our Customer Contact Centre at 1800 4192 033 or 91 124 623 3502. Our colleagues are available from 08:00 am to 08:00 pm (Mon-Fri) and 09:00 am to 05:00 pm (Sat-Sun/Public Holidays). 1/2

data.text: @naren2talk @airfrance @AirFranceFR Hi Naren, The option of putting the Coupon Code comes on the payments page under the head "Have a Discount Code or a Voucher?" You need to put the discount code AFWDMARBME For T&C please visit https://t.co/NCiTKnX2IM
